name: CHIMP
tagline: a hierarchical planner for mobile robots.
body:
CHIMP is a hierarchical hybrid planner that aims at enabling a mobile robot to use different forms of knowledge in its planning process. It combines HTN-planning and meta-constraint reasoning. It is based on the [Meta-CSP Framwork](http://metacsp.org).

Instructions and examples how CHIMP can be used will follow soon!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
